archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Stakeholder Needs and Requirements Definition
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.2.1] The purpose of the Stakeholder Needs and Requirements Definition process is to define the stakeholder requirements for a system that can provide the capabilities needed by users and other stakeholders in a defined environment.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 52

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "[6.4.2.1] Zweck des Prozesses "Definition der Stakeholder-Bedarfe und -Anforderungen" ist die Aufnahme sämtlicher Anforderungen an ein System, das die von Nutzern und anderen Stakeholdern benötigten Leistungen in einer definierten Umgebung erbringt".

As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.2.1] The purpose of the Stakeholder Needs and Requirements Definition process is to define the stakeholder requirements for a system that can provide the capabilities needed by users and other stakeholders in a defined environment.
